alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 4:17PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Weber... eastern Box Elder...northwestern Davis...west central Morgan and north central Tooele Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 415 PM MDT, Doppler radar and satellite were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles southeast of Park Valley to 11 miles west of Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 57 mph. Blowing dust will reduce visibility. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ogden, Brigham City, Tremonton, Hill Air Force Base, Roy, Clinton, North Ogden, South Ogden, Washington Terrace, Riverdale, Hooper, South Weber, Perry, Willard, Marriott-Slaterville, Bear River City, Corinne, Howell, Weber State University and Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway. This storm will continue to produce strong gusty winds on the Great Salt Lake. This will lead to a continuation of waves and very choppy waters which will result in hazardous boating conditions. Boaters are urged to seek safe harbor if possible. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 337 and 370, and between mile markers 374 and 383. Interstate 84 between mile markers 17 and 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
